> Hauntly is a mobile application for paranormal investigation and ghost hunting, developed by Frumpets Ltd. Available on iOS and Android.

## About
Hauntly is the ultimate ghost hunting companion app. It provides professional-grade tools for detecting and documenting paranormal activity using your smartphone's built-in sensors. The app combines EMF detection, EVP recording and analysis, photo/video capture, and a comprehensive investigation journal into a single, intuitive interface.

## Key Features
- **EMF Detection**: Uses the phone's magnetometer to detect electromagnetic field anomalies in real time
- **EVP Recorder & Analyzer**: Captures electronic voice phenomena with multiple background sounds. Pro includes spectrogram, frequency spectrum, EQ, filters, reverse playback, and A-B looping
- **Photo & Video Capture**: Record investigations with paranormal-themed visual effects and an annotation editor
- **Ghost Hunt Journal**: Document every investigation with notes, timestamps, environmental data, and a searchable timeline
- **Night Vision Camera**: Record video investigations in complete darkness
- **Collaborative Investigations**: Share real-time sensor data with team members (Pro feature)

## Pricing
- **Free**: Core ghost hunting tools, EVP recording (15 seconds), 2 background sounds, basic waveform, EMF detection, photo/video, journal
- **Pro (subscription)**: Extended recording (15 minutes), 8 background sounds, full EVP Analyzer suite, PDF export, ad-free

## Technical Details
- Platform: iOS and Android
- Sensors used: Magnetometer (EMF), Microphone (EVP), Camera (photo/video)
- Data storage: All user data stored locally on device, never uploaded to servers
- Third-party services: Google AdMob (ads, free tier only), Sentry (crash reporting)
